programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Tav and Mike team up once again to find unique opportunities in Canada as well villas in Los Cabos, Mexico.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Downsizing can be a difficult transition & Jin's objective is to make it as seamless as possible. In this episode, Jin is getting outdoors by practicing archery with Mike but mostly just to compete for bragging rights. Jin's client is moving from a house in Port Credit to a luxurious condo close to the downtown core. They desire extra bedrooms for when their children are visiting, all the amenities, & waterfront views.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: It is time to upsize! Daryl's client is moving away from downtown Toronto because they desire a bigger space, more privacy, & tranquility. They have 3 children between the ages of 7 & 13 who need their own bedrooms & the lady of the house needs an office since she works from home. Daryl knows all about tranquility & goes golfing with Mike to discuss his client & Mike's listing for them.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Mike's couple is looking for their luxurious dream home anywhere in between Toronto & Barrie near HWY 400 in a prestigious neighborhood. They have a large dog, tall family, & want to start a family of their own. This means they are going to need a lot of space & want the house to be fully renovated or brand-new. Mike is the perfect agent for this couple because he lives, eats, & breathes the luxury lifestyle.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: An amazing beachfront property is what Inez's couple is looking for & these top million dollar agents are sure to surpass their expectations. Inez's client currently lives in a condo & have one child, however, they desire a home that they can comfortably expand their family in.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Somewhere to spend the rest of their days surrounded by nature sounds like a paradise to retire in. Daryl & Jin play some golf to discuss a potential listing she has found & Mike aids Inez in purchasing a new vehicle. Daryl's client has older children with their own families now so they are looking for a home with lots of land & nature. It is very important to them because they want to be able to have everyone comfortably visit & eventually retire here in a few years.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: A young trendy couple wants to start a family in Toronto but they need some help from these top million dollar agents. Jin is a natural daredevil & has always wanted to skydive with her clients. In Oakville, Jin practices at iFly that is an indoor skydiving facility. Jin's client lives a very active & busy lifestyle so they require somewhere with low maintenance but still has enough space for a big family. Inez takes Jin to her hair stylist Anastasia for some business & pleasure.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Moving in together can be stressful but fun because you are starting a new life together! Inez's client is selling their separate properties & looking for a house or condo in the city or beach area that is close to shopping, groceries, schools, etc. Inez's couple is not too picky & open to different kinds of properties. Daryl & Inez enjoy a beautiful bike ride along the beaches boardwalk to discuss her client & the perfect luxury listing he has found.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Agreeing on a vacation home is made much harder when these top million dollar agents have astounding listings. Mike's client is looking for a waterfront cottage with lots of land & privacy. What better way to check out some waterfront listings then from a helicopter? Debbie wants a family cottage that feels homey, however, Paul wants an impressive high-end cottage that he can bring his business clients to.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Now that Kristen & Kane have opened an office in Toronto, they will be travelling a lot from Vancouver & want somewhere of their own to stay in. Daryl & the other top million dollar agents have a wide range to search over because Daryl's client is willing to live an hour or two drive away from downtown Toronto. Daryl, Jin, & Mike meet up for lunch in Port Dover to discuss business & later in the episode Mike & Daryl get their hands dirty in the kitchen at Sababa Restaurant.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Many people enjoy staying busy & always having a project on the go. Inez's client loves to build & create breathtaking properties. On their next project, this couple wants an interesting property, preferably waterfront, which they can use for an investment property or to build on. Inez takes her client on a private yacht so they can cruise around Lake Ontario & discuss the client's wish list.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Deborah & Vezi are an international couple that want to live in Toronto for one year but has no idea where to start looking. Luckily for them Mike, Jin, Daryl, & Inez have teamed up to find them the home of their dreams. They agree to split the commission & throw a yacht party for the client's decision. Mike arranges a private plane for all four agents to go to Montreal & discuss in style what the client is looking for.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Will Daryl be able to dazzle his clients and find a property that will take their breath away? This episode features the first two of four properties, with a special guest appearance by Design Generation builder and designer Carlo Rinomato.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: International luxury realtor Mike Donia jets off to Thailand to work with a client and good friend of his, Mae. She is moving back to her hometown of Bangkok to pursue her modeling career, and is looking for the house of her dreams. Mike has his work cut out for him, as Mae's long wish list will be hard to achieve with her budget.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of a Bangkok real estate expert, Max Gloeckner, Mike is confident he can deliver just what Mae is looking for. This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the client decides to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vicky is searching for a home in The Beaches for her and her family. No one knows the Beach like Inez Kudryk, so Vicky enlists her help in finding some stunning luxury properties to tour. With a grand budget and very particular tastes, Inez knows that Vicky will be a tough client to please.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Steve Bailey to save the day! This week's episode features the lovely couple Chris and Rosa as they search for the perfect home. While Rosa is mainly concerned with cutting down her commute, Chris just wants to feel a connection to a property. Luckily for Steve, he's got his sister Helen, an interior designer and home stager, to help sway Chris - and it works!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Unfortunately for Rosa, she isn't seeing the benefits of moving to a town around Cambridge. Steve's got some neat ideas, but will they be able to convince Rosa? This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E09 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Sofie Kehdi heads to the island of Ambergris Caye, Belize to help a friend and former client, actress and choreographer Zuzana Marosová. As a public figure, Zuzana craves privacy in her personal time and is looking for a relaxing space to unwind with her children.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E10 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of local realtor Daniel Hartin, Sofie sets her sights on the perfect home...and hopefully a bit of fun in the sun! This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the client decides to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E12 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of local agents Max Gloeckner and Nala Gill, will Mike be able to find a place that suits the whole family? This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E13 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: After helping them find a home last season, Inez is enlisted by Martin and Cheryl to help them find the perfect investment property. While Cheryl wants a property with minimal work and no landlord responsibilities, Martin is more open to renovations and taking on some of the commonplace duties associated with property management.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E14 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase, with special guest appearances by interior design expert Shelley Alexanian and guest agent Mo Loulou.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E15 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This week's episode features Cambridge realtor extraordinaire Steve Bailey as he helps couple Dan and Melinda search for the perfect home. It's a real battle of contemporary vs. traditional as Dan and Melinda hash it out over where their future lies. Melinda surprises Dan with some new information, but can Steve surprise them both by showing them the perfect property?

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E17 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vancouver-based couple Jim and Shannon are looking to relocate to their hometown of Toronto with their two daughters. With a budget of 10 million dollars, they enlist the help of savvy realtor Sofie Kehdi. While it might first seem that Jim and Shannon are on the same page, the house hunt proves that they have some differing opinions on what makes a good investment.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E18 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase, with a special appearance by guest agent Tyrone N. Steer.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E19 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Off on another adventure! This episode takes Mike Donia on a whirlwind tour of Southeast Asia as he searches for a home for his clients, Antonio and Kim. Featuring properties in Thailand, Indonesia, and the Philippines, each country has its own unique charms to offer the would-be buyers. Monkeys, mangoes and mansions are in store for Mike as he continues his hunt for that perfect property.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E21 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vezi and Deborah love the house they purchased last season in Stouffville, but they are ready to make the move to the big city. They enlist the help of Inez Kudryk to show them the best properties she can find in Toronto, and they are especially keen on the Beaches neighborhood. Vezi works in the music industry, so Inez lines up some special surprises to wow her clients!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E22 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vezi and Deborah love the house they purchased last season in Stouffville, but they are ready to make the move to the big city. They enlist the help of Inez Kudryk to show them the best properties she can find in Toronto, and they are especially keen on the Beaches neighborhood. Vezi works in the music industry, so Inez lines up some special surprises to wow her clients!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E23 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura and Steven are a young couple with an expanding family, and are ready to take the next steps in home ownership. They want a large plot of land for their young children to run around and enjoy nature, and a spacious home that reflects this new phase of their life. Steve Bailey is the man for the job, and with such great homes to choose from, Laura and Steve will be hard pressed to pick just one!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E24 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura and Steven are a young couple with an expanding family, and are ready to take the next steps in home ownership. They want a large plot of land for their young children to run around and enjoy nature, and a spacious home that reflects this new phase of their life. Steve Bailey is the man for the job, and with such great homes to choose from, Laura and Steve will be hard pressed to pick just one!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E26 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Sofie Kehdi heads back to Belize to help husband and wife team Rachel and Ben size up some resort properties. Along with their investors, Rachel and Ben are looking to purchase a resort on the island of Ambergris Caye that will provide the most bang for their buck. Each with a big personality of their own, it becomes clear this couple is not going to see eye to eye on what they want. Luckily for them, Sofie is a pro at mediating conflicts when it comes to real estate.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Julie and James are looking for a new home to raise their two boys. James is in the tech industry and would love an energy efficient home. Julie has her own dance studio and can't wait to get back to work after giving birth to her second son. Eve and Shawn are the perfect team for the job, especially with Timberworx's cutting edge "Net-Zero" project.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Giulia and Scott have recently come into an inheritance and want the house of their dreams. Currently, they live in a modest bungalow in a busy neighbourhood but would prefer to live in a secluded house with a magnificent view. Ideally, Giulia also wants a house that has separate living quarters for her ageing parents.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Kevin is a retired, successful businessman. He is a single dad to Shannon and Jennifer. Shannon has been accepted into the Ontario Veterinarian College at the University of Guelph, which is Canada's leading program in veterinary health care. This is the reason they are moving to Guelph. Kevin is happy to live anywhere as long as it has excellent golf courses. Eve will be glad to tell him that Guelph just happens to have 3 of the top ones in Ontario.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Louise, Jason, and their two children have been living in Europe for the past 10 years, but now they would like to be closer to their family in Canada. Louise absolutely adores the European aesthetic; the sense of luxury conveyed by multi-peaked roof-lines, bay-shaped windows, and decorative stone. She wants a house that allows them the feeling of "living abroad" without leaving the country.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Diogo is a dedicated musician working on his new album. He has been debating between moving to Miami or staying in Canada. Toronto is closer to his family and where he feels at home with his music. Danielle will show him some spectacular properties in both cities and see what he decides.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Elizabeth and Michael are retired and want to move closer to their kids and grandchildren. They want to downsize from their two-story house into a bungalow. Luckily, Eve knows all about luxury bungalows. Elizabeth loves to exercise and really would like a gym. Michael has a passion for cars and needs at least a three-car garage. Their current house is dated so they would love a house that is turnkey. Eve will do her best to find their forever home.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E09 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Darlene and Bruce are in the market for a new home and have enlisted Laura to help them out. Darlene's one request is that they stay close to their current home, where their daughter goes to school. For Bruce, quality construction materials and workmanship are of paramount importance. One thing the entire family agrees on is that the backyard should have a fantastic entertainment space since they spend plenty of time together outdoors and enjoy having guests over.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E10 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Kathryn and Neil are true urbanites. They love what downtown Toronto has to offer. When Neil found out his company was relocating to Guelph, they weren't thrilled. After five months of long commutes, the Thompson family is ready to take the risk and make a move-with some conditions. The new house has to have a pool and playroom for the kids and a large entertainment area for adults. Eve's challenge is to find them an enticing home that will convince their friends from the city to visit.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E11 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Ashley and Ali are ready to take their relationship and living situation to the next level. The young entrepreneurs are prepared to move into a house, but the one thing they can't agree on is where to live. Ashley wants an estate home outside the city that has an outdoor pool and beautifully manicured gardens. Ali, on the other hand, insists on being close to his downtown office and walking distance from restaurants and shops.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E12 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Stephanie is making a big move from BC to Guelph to be closer to her son John and his family. She doesn't want the move to be a hassle and is looking for an accessible, decent-sized home for her grandchildren and visitors from BC. Good sized guest rooms and a large backyard are a must. As she loves to cook, she would also like a new kitchen. Eve will show Stephanie 3 beautiful homes that fit the criteria. Stephanie is going to have a difficult decision.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: George is a retired basket ball player, and Mada is an international model. For a man over 7 feet tall, finding the perfect house might be a challenge. Danielle knows high ceilings come in all shapes and sizes, can she find a style they'll like? They also want a pool and a home theatre.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Suhail and Niki have busy schedules. He's a marketing director and she's a doctor so she's often on call for a hospital downtown. Can they find a place that can help relieve stress, but also be close enough to downtown for those urgent calls? They want a secluded home with at least 1 acre and magnificent views.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Wendy and Daniel are looking to downsize after their kids have moved out, but still want an elegant home. She's a physical therapist and she's a business analyst. They want something that can help them relax at the end of the day, with at least 4 bedrooms and away from the downtown core. Can Lou find them something that fits?

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Danielle is helping quite a pair, Joseph is a chiropractor and Nadia is an aerospace engineer. They're looking for a home to start a family. Not only that, they want space to host their extended family. Will it be as difficult as rocket science?

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: These two business owners Joseph and Heather work hard and want to play hard! They're looking for a place to entertain guests, and Daryl's got some amazing homes to show them.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura Compagni teams up with Mataj Architects and The Parentela Family to introduce the first of the Hotel Vie chain of luxury hotels.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Downsizing can be a difficult transition & Jin's objective is to make it as seamless as possible. In this episode, Jin is getting outdoors by practicing archery with Mike but mostly just to compete for bragging rights. Jin's client is moving from a house in Port Credit to a luxurious condo close to the downtown core. They desire extra bedrooms for when their children are visiting, all the amenities, & waterfront views.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Mike's couple is looking for their luxurious dream home anywhere in between Toronto & Barrie near HWY 400 in a prestigious neighborhood. They have a large dog, tall family, & want to start a family of their own. This means they are going to need a lot of space & want the house to be fully renovated or brand-new. Mike is the perfect agent for this couple because he lives, eats, & breathes the luxury lifestyle.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: An amazing beachfront property is what Inez's couple is looking for & these top million dollar agents are sure to surpass their expectations. Inez's client currently lives in a condo & have one child, however, they desire a home that they can comfortably expand their family in.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Mike's friend invites him to an Indian wedding & tells him about his uncle who is looking for a luxury condo close to the airport. Daryl, Inez, & Jin support & donate to Mike's charity after winning a bet amongst them & the amount is determined by how long Mike lasts in the ring boxing against a professional. This client is looking for an investment property & a place for him to live when visiting.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Somewhere to spend the rest of their days surrounded by nature sounds like a paradise to retire in. Daryl & Jin play some golf to discuss a potential listing she has found & Mike aids Inez in purchasing a new vehicle. Daryl's client has older children with their own families now so they are looking for a home with lots of land & nature. It is very important to them because they want to be able to have everyone comfortably visit & eventually retire here in a few years.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Moving in together can be stressful but fun because you are starting a new life together! Inez's client is selling their separate properties & looking for a house or condo in the city or beach area that is close to shopping, groceries, schools, etc. Inez's couple is not too picky & open to different kinds of properties. Daryl & Inez enjoy a beautiful bike ride along the beaches boardwalk to discuss her client & the perfect luxury listing he has found.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Agreeing on a vacation home is made much harder when these top million dollar agents have astounding listings. Mike's client is looking for a waterfront cottage with lots of land & privacy. What better way to check out some waterfront listings then from a helicopter? Debbie wants a family cottage that feels homey, however, Paul wants an impressive high-end cottage that he can bring his business clients to.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Remarrying is hard enough let alone combining two families under one roof. With a total of 4 children between the ages of 7 & 16 Jin's client is definitely going to need lots of space & land in a safe neighborhood. Daryl, Inez, & Mike attend Jin's band practice to support her & listen to the set list they have prepared for an upcoming charity event. Jin gets her nails done frequently & this time Daryl decides to join her for some much needed pampering.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Now that Kristen & Kane have opened an office in Toronto, they will be travelling a lot from Vancouver & want somewhere of their own to stay in. Daryl & the other top million dollar agents have a wide range to search over because Daryl's client is willing to live an hour or two drive away from downtown Toronto. Daryl, Jin, & Mike meet up for lunch in Port Dover to discuss business & later in the episode Mike & Daryl get their hands dirty in the kitchen at Sababa Restaurant.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Deborah & Vezi are an international couple that want to live in Toronto for one year but has no idea where to start looking. Luckily for them Mike, Jin, Daryl, & Inez have teamed up to find them the home of their dreams. They agree to split the commission & throw a yacht party for the client's decision. Mike arranges a private plane for all four agents to go to Montreal & discuss in style what the client is looking for.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: The King is back, baby! Daryl King is known to make an entrance, and he wants the houses he shows to have that same "wow" factor. His clients are looking for a grand mansion, and with their sizeable budget won't settle for anything less than spectacular.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Will Daryl be able to dazzle his clients and find a property that will take their breath away? This episode features the first two of four properties, with a special guest appearance by Design Generation builder and designer Carlo Rinomato.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of a Bangkok real estate expert, Max Gloeckner, Mike is confident he can deliver just what Mae is looking for. This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the client decides to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vicky is searching for a home in The Beaches for her and her family. No one knows the Beach like Inez Kudryk, so Vicky enlists her help in finding some stunning luxury properties to tour. With a grand budget and very particular tastes, Inez knows that Vicky will be a tough client to please.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Will Vicky find the forever home of her dreams? This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase and special appearances by guest agent Jasmine Xuereb and mortgage broker Paul Meredith.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Steve Bailey to save the day! This week's episode features the lovely couple Chris and Rosa as they search for the perfect home. While Rosa is mainly concerned with cutting down her commute, Chris just wants to feel a connection to a property. Luckily for Steve, he's got his sister Helen, an interior designer and home stager, to help sway Chris - and it works!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E09 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Sofie Kehdi heads to the island of Ambergris Caye, Belize to help a friend and former client, actress and choreographer Zuzana Marosová. As a public figure, Zuzana craves privacy in her personal time and is looking for a relaxing space to unwind with her children.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E10 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of local realtor Daniel Hartin, Sofie sets her sights on the perfect home...and hopefully a bit of fun in the sun! This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the client decides to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E11 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Jessica and Mark are a young couple living and working in Thailand after meeting there several years ago and falling in love. They are looking for a permanent home in Bangkok, and after chatting with her friend Mae, Jessica knows that Mike Donia is the man for the job.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E13 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: After helping them find a home last season, Inez is enlisted by Martin and Cheryl to help them find the perfect investment property. While Cheryl wants a property with minimal work and no landlord responsibilities, Martin is more open to renovations and taking on some of the commonplace duties associated with property management.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E14 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase, with special guest appearances by interior design expert Shelley Alexanian and guest agent Mo Loulou.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E15 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This week's episode features Cambridge realtor extraordinaire Steve Bailey as he helps couple Dan and Melinda search for the perfect home. It's a real battle of contemporary vs. traditional as Dan and Melinda hash it out over where their future lies. Melinda surprises Dan with some new information, but can Steve surprise them both by showing them the perfect property?

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E16 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase, with a special guest appearance by interior design expert Shelley Alexanian.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E18 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase, with a special appearance by guest agent Tyrone N. Steer.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E19 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Off on another adventure! This episode takes Mike Donia on a whirlwind tour of Southeast Asia as he searches for a home for his clients, Antonio and Kim. Featuring properties in Thailand, Indonesia, and the Philippines, each country has its own unique charms to offer the would-be buyers. Monkeys, mangoes and mansions are in store for Mike as he continues his hunt for that perfect property.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E20 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Off on another adventure! This episode takes Mike Donia on a whirlwind tour of Southeast Asia as he searches for a home for his clients, Antonio and Kim. Featuring properties in Thailand, Indonesia, and the Philippines, each country has its own unique charms to offer the would-be buyers. Monkeys, mangoes and mansions are in store for Mike as he continues his hunt for that perfect property.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E22 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vezi and Deborah love the house they purchased last season in Stouffville, but they are ready to make the move to the big city. They enlist the help of Inez Kudryk to show them the best properties she can find in Toronto, and they are especially keen on the Beaches neighborhood. Vezi works in the music industry, so Inez lines up some special surprises to wow her clients!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E23 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura and Steven are a young couple with an expanding family, and are ready to take the next steps in home ownership. They want a large plot of land for their young children to run around and enjoy nature, and a spacious home that reflects this new phase of their life. Steve Bailey is the man for the job, and with such great homes to choose from, Laura and Steve will be hard pressed to pick just one!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E24 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura and Steven are a young couple with an expanding family, and are ready to take the next steps in home ownership. They want a large plot of land for their young children to run around and enjoy nature, and a spacious home that reflects this new phase of their life. Steve Bailey is the man for the job, and with such great homes to choose from, Laura and Steve will be hard pressed to pick just one!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E25 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Sofie Kehdi heads back to Belize to help husband and wife team Rachel and Ben size up some resort properties. Along with their investors, Rachel and Ben are looking to purchase a resort on the island of Ambergris Caye that will provide the most bang for their buck. Each with a big personality of their own, it becomes clear this couple is not going to see eye to eye on what they want. Luckily for them, Sofie is a pro at mediating conflicts when it comes to real estate.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Julie and James are looking for a new home to raise their two boys. James is in the tech industry and would love an energy efficient home. Julie has her own dance studio and can't wait to get back to work after giving birth to her second son. Eve and Shawn are the perfect team for the job, especially with Timberworx's cutting edge "Net-Zero" project.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Giulia and Scott have recently come into an inheritance and want the house of their dreams. Currently, they live in a modest bungalow in a busy neighbourhood but would prefer to live in a secluded house with a magnificent view. Ideally, Giulia also wants a house that has separate living quarters for her ageing parents.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Kevin is a retired, successful businessman. He is a single dad to Shannon and Jennifer. Shannon has been accepted into the Ontario Veterinarian College at the University of Guelph, which is Canada's leading program in veterinary health care. This is the reason they are moving to Guelph. Kevin is happy to live anywhere as long as it has excellent golf courses. Eve will be glad to tell him that Guelph just happens to have 3 of the top ones in Ontario.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura is on the hunt for a new home for long time clients Marino and Paula. The couple and their three kids would like a spacious house with a country feel to escape their hectic lifestyles. Due to Marino's busy schedule as a producer, he would prefer a house that is all-inclusive and turnkey. Their kids are very active want a pool and the option for horse stables. Laura's going to find them the perfect home.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Diogo is a dedicated musician working on his new album. He has been debating between moving to Miami or staying in Canada. Toronto is closer to his family and where he feels at home with his music. Danielle will show him some spectacular properties in both cities and see what he decides.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Elizabeth and Michael are retired and want to move closer to their kids and grandchildren. They want to downsize from their two-story house into a bungalow. Luckily, Eve knows all about luxury bungalows. Elizabeth loves to exercise and really would like a gym. Michael has a passion for cars and needs at least a three-car garage. Their current house is dated so they would love a house that is turnkey. Eve will do her best to find their forever home.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Tomarra and Rob had just married and blended their two families. As a new family, they want to transition to a quiet neighbourhood away from the hustle and bustle of Toronto. Steve is up for the challenge. Rob is a writer and plans to work from home, while Tomarra is a naturopath who would love to have her own studio. Ultimately, they want to start cherishing the real things in life, and that is spending more time with their kids.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E10 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Kathryn and Neil are true urbanites. They love what downtown Toronto has to offer. When Neil found out his company was relocating to Guelph, they weren't thrilled. After five months of long commutes, the Thompson family is ready to take the risk and make a move-with some conditions. The new house has to have a pool and playroom for the kids and a large entertainment area for adults. Eve's challenge is to find them an enticing home that will convince their friends from the city to visit.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E11 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Ashley and Ali are ready to take their relationship and living situation to the next level. The young entrepreneurs are prepared to move into a house, but the one thing they can't agree on is where to live. Ashley wants an estate home outside the city that has an outdoor pool and beautifully manicured gardens. Ali, on the other hand, insists on being close to his downtown office and walking distance from restaurants and shops.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E12 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Stephanie is making a big move from BC to Guelph to be closer to her son John and his family. She doesn't want the move to be a hassle and is looking for an accessible, decent-sized home for her grandchildren and visitors from BC. Good sized guest rooms and a large backyard are a must. As she loves to cook, she would also like a new kitchen. Eve will show Stephanie 3 beautiful homes that fit the criteria. Stephanie is going to have a difficult decision.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: George is a retired basket ball player, and Mada is an international model. For a man over 7 feet tall, finding the perfect house might be a challenge. Danielle knows high ceilings come in all shapes and sizes, can she find a style they'll like? They also want a pool and a home theatre.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Suhail and Niki have busy schedules. He's a marketing director and she's a doctor so she's often on call for a hospital downtown. Can they find a place that can help relieve stress, but also be close enough to downtown for those urgent calls? They want a secluded home with at least 1 acre and magnificent views.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Wendy and Daniel are looking to downsize after their kids have moved out, but still want an elegant home. She's a physical therapist and she's a business analyst. They want something that can help them relax at the end of the day, with at least 4 bedrooms and away from the downtown core. Can Lou find them something that fits?

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Danielle is helping quite a pair, Joseph is a chiropractor and Nadia is an aerospace engineer. They're looking for a home to start a family. Not only that, they want space to host their extended family. Will it be as difficult as rocket science?

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: These two business owners Joseph and Heather work hard and want to play hard! They're looking for a place to entertain guests, and Daryl's got some amazing homes to show them.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S05 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vipin's family of four are in the market to purchase their own dream home in the Greater Toronto Area.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S05 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Phil and Aubree, a newly wed couple, are in the market to purchase a dream home in Castlemore.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S05 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: When Dana and Eric aren't busy with their successful family business, they have their hands full with their 4 children.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S05 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Jonathan and Kerry are in the market for a new home to share memories in with their family; with a budget of 12 million dollars, Real Estate Agent Tav Schembri is challenged to find the family their dream home.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S05 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Nathan, a start up company owner and his fiance Kelsey, a owner of a holistic nutrition company, are open to purchasing a house anywhere in the GTA.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S06 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Broker Jasmine Xuereb must smooth the way for buyers Cindy and Andrew to decide whether they should buy a house in their homeland or in a different country.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S06 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Fernando and his investment group are looking to either buy or build a resort in Canada or Mexico with the help of Joe Petrella Construction.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S06 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Real Estate Agents Jasmine Xuereb & Laura Compagni team up to aid power couple Jamie and Jennifer in purchasing either a real estate investment in Canada or Belize.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S06 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: The brokers explore Central America to find real estate options that fit the bill for two buyers looking for a change of scene.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S06 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Since working from home has become increasingly popular, Paul and Sonia are entertaining the idea of living and working abroad.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Marshall and Maria can't decide whether they should buy a property in Canada (Marshall's homeland) or Cuba (Maria's homeland).

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Alan & Amber are ready to buy the property of their dreams, and broker Jasmine Xuereb is ready to help!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Rick looks for properties in Canada and abroad; Tav Schembri suggests Caledon; Mike Donia recommends Panama.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura aids Nick Regina and Michael Succurro of Spark Financial Group in purchasing a smart property investment.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Tav and Mike team up once again to find unique opportunities in Canada as well villas in Los Cabos, Mexico.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent

programme.desc: Laura Compagni teams up with Mataj Architects and The Parentela Family to introduce the first of the Hotel Vie chain of luxury hotels.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman refuses to wear jail-issued clothing. A man tells his tearful tale to officers, and a chatty inebriated woman is placed in isolation.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A drug dealer's mean-spirited girlfriend lands herself in isolation. The police deal with an inebriated man accused of throwing rocks, and guards attempt to defuse a situation involving battling cellmates.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An uncooperative woman fights arrest resulting in a trip to the isolation chamber. One inmate calls 911 within jail walls causing confusion. Later, officers run to the rescue when a man passes out.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Texting, drinking and driving are not a good mix for a mother with her baby in the backseat of her car. After his arrest for shoplifting, a young man begins to realize the consequences of his lifestyle choices. A woman arrested on a warrant finds herself in solitary confinement after showing off her assets to another inmate. Officers try to convince a homeless young man that patching up his relationship with his family is better than being drunk on the streets.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A strip search reveals a male inmate in women's lingerie. A couple of puppy thieves get amorous in the bathroom, and a pregnant woman is arrested for solicitation.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A secret stash is uncovered during a search at a suspect's property. Two rowdy inmates don't quite hit it off when they invade each other's personal space, and a jaywalker experiences problems keeping his pants from falling down.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An inmate swallows a stash of drugs and then comes down with a case of the munchies. A 72-year-old offers an unusual excuse for dealing drugs to teens at a mall, and a woman charged with assaulting a landlord fakes being sick to get out of jail.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An inmate is subdued for refusing to follow commands. A woman accused of running out on a dinner bill has her jewelry sawed off in jail. After issuing criminal terrorist threats, a man is jailed.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Officers outwit a man who refuses to give his name. A repeat DUI offender is jailed yet again. An intoxicated man is taken into custody and once the alcohol wears off he reveals that he’s broken his sobriety.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A cell brawl escalates quickly. After being arrested on her wedding night, a woman has deep regrets and serious reflection. Officers free a man from his own noose and place him on a vigilant watch.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A jail chaplain counsels a sad inmate. An intoxicated woman demands to talk to the Canadian Embassy.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Angry over her arrest, a woman becomes combative with officers. Busted once again for drugs, a smart young woman knows she is making dumb choices but can’t stop using. A man eluding the police swipes food from his workplace before landing in jail. Officers get a laugh from an arrested panhandler who wants to buy a permit for panhandling.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An inmate refuses to be handcuffed while officers seek to search his cell for contraband. A man tells deputies he is known as “Baby Boy” amongst the ladies. Fights erupt during prison phone time.

programme.title: Jail

programme.desc: A kind man gets more than he bargained for from his new roommate. Cops discover the unexpected consequences of punching a scooter. Officers stop a sober suspect who may not be from the same planet as them.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S23 : E18 Spiked but Still Moving
programme.desc: A suspect refuses to stop his vehicle even after the officers spike his tires. A dispute over money results in a pregnant woman being attacked. A woman asks for officers to help her rescue cats from a trailer.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A couple gets into a fight with their in-laws when they attempt to take their baby on a 3am drive. Two suspects proclaim their innocence after walking away from a hit and run. A man is attacked by his roommate after he gets ‘too friendly’ with a woman in their home.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S21 : E04 Settled with a Pipe
programme.desc: A man attacking a woman is tackled by an officer. A vehicle is pulled over for a drug deal in progress. A woman smashes a car window with a pipe in a fit of road rage.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A vehicle is caught traveling in the opposite direction. A sting operation is designed to nab suspects who purchase narcotics. Officers respond to a shoplifting call at a local thrift store.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S13 : E04 There Goes that Alligator
programme.desc: Police arrest a suspect for armed robbery. A six foot alligator is found on a homeowner's back porch. An Officer assists in an undercover sting.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A suspect in a traffic stop decides to handle the situation by screaming at the police. Officers have a close encounter with a suspect who admits that he has hidden contraband. A man’s clothing choices tip police off to possible criminal behavior.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S16 : E29 The Last Home Invasion
programme.desc: Police investigate an attempted robbery that turned deadly. Officers enlist a K9 unit to flush out a suspect. A high-speed chase comes to an end when the suspect crashes into a fence.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers encounter an unusual situation where the victim and suspect have defiantly barricaded themselves inside the house. Officers respond to a domestic dispute at a nearby apartment complex.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A woman tells Officers she’s a vampire. Officers question a colorful man dressed as a woman. A violent woman screams obscenities at Officers and needs to be restrained.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: The suspect of a carjacking tells an Officer that he would rather go to jail than face the wrath of his mother. An Officer investigates a domestic call involving a husband, wife and a lamp. A slow speed pursuit ensues and the suspects are booked for felony, eluding, and drugs.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S22 : E12 The Car is Mine!
programme.desc: A man locks himself in a trunk after deputies respond to a restraining order call. Deputies respond to two women arguing over the ownership of a car. A driver comes clean to a deputy during a traffic stop.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S14 : E01 UC Drug Sting I
programme.desc: A man with a suspended license flees a routine traffic stop on foot. Deputies respond to a battered woman after receiving a 911 hang up call. A sting operation nets a suspected drug dealer.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A driver denies ownership of what police find in his car. Police conduct a narcotics sting that nets several arrests. A deputy removes a pooch from the scene of an accident.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S14 : E28 Slow Mo’ Drag Racer
programme.desc: Officers engage in a bizarre slow-speed chase after a suspect’s failure to stop. A woman is pulled over after leaving a known drug house. An Officer pursues two illegal drag racers on a public highway.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Teens are arrested after authorities find an open container and drugs inside a vehicle. A suspect is arrested after fleeing the police. Officers respond to a fight involving two men and a shovel.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers detect a strong odor of marijuana during a routine traffic stop. A woman tells Officers her inebriated boyfriend smashed a window. Police investigate a suspicious vehicle parked behind a cemetery.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers pursue two brothers after an attempted bank robbery. A confused man with a shotgun calls police after hearing voices. A man asks deputies for a break after they find illegal items in his truck.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S21 : E03 Gas up and Run!
programme.desc: A man is tasered twice after struggling with two deputies. A gas station fight ends in a foot chase. A deputy pulls over a pair of quarreling lovers after they run a stop sign.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A fleeing vehicle goes for a spin when officers execute a perfect PIT maneuver. Cops try to flush out a suspect who barricades himself inside a donut shop. Officers hit the meth mother lode when they stop a truck in a downpour.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S14 : E09 What’s my name again?
programme.desc: Officers respond to a threatening man with a weapon. A man gives Officers a false name forgetting he’s wearing his name tag. A suspect in a stolen car collides with another vehicle then flees on foot.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: An out-of-control woman needs to be subdued after an arrest. Deputies spot an erratic driver who appears to be under the influence. A car is seen driving backwards on a one-way street.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S24 : E08 You've Gotta Believe Me
programme.desc: A DWI suspect flees from police because he thinks they won’t believe his version of events. A suspect is stopped for jaywalking but when questioned she can’t keep still. A naive man leaves his car unattended for a moment.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers attempt to pull over a suspect reported having been involved in a car jacking. A suspect is caught in the act of burying a bag with illegal prescription drugs.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Deputies tase a man who almost ran over a deputy with his truck. A man gives police false information after saving a boy who fell into a pool. A woman tries to buy drugs from an undercover officer.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Agents of the US Customs and Border Protection pursue a vehicle. Border agents spot two undocumented people while scanning train tracks. Airport Customs detains a man when agents suspect he might be carrying more than luggage.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers are dispatched to an apartment complex where a young girl may have been a victim of a sexual assault. An officer spots a speeding motorcycle and attempts a routine stop.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers try to make sense of a store transaction turned wrestling match. An intoxicated woman calls the cops when her boyfriend tries to flush her late husband's ashes. A shirtless man with a nasty attitude defies officers.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S27 : E33 Be Careful What You Ask For
programme.desc: An irate man begs the police to shoot him. A drunken woman gets nasty after being arrested for domestic assault. Cops wade through lies as they make sense of a most dysfunctional family.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A police chase becomes more dangerous when the hood of a stolen vehicle flips open. A purse snatcher denies robbing a woman. A limping man with a knee injury denies crashing his car into a tree.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: An officer attempts to pull over a man on a bicycle who refuses to stop. An officer arrests two suspects involved in a drug deal who attempt to discard the evidence. An officer questions a driver leaving a known drug area.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers respond to a call of a naked man inside a school. A woman being questioned by Police is oblivious to her wardrobe malfunction. Officers on patrol order several female nude sunbathers to cover up.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: The boat unit contends with an unruly suspect and his equally unpredictable dogs. Two burglary suspects try to claim car trouble when they're found at the scene of the crime. A repentant meth addict is caught by officers on the brink of his latest relapse.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Two cousins fight over a five dollar debt. Police arrest a man for domestic violence. A taxi cab driver is robbed and shot.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S15 : E09 Crazy as a Loon
programme.desc: Officers conduct a traffic stop on a vehicle that ran a stop sign. Officers retrieve birds from a fireplace and release them outside. Officers conduct a drug-reversal-buy sting to capture buyers.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S21 : E17 Rocks in my Socks
programme.desc: Deputies discover a purse and a sock containing paraphernalia during an arrest. Deputies pursue an intoxicated motorcyclist. A woman is suspected of stealing a cake.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers spot a suspected stolen vehicle and a pursuit ensues. Officers are called to a fight at a bar over a tossed drink. Police are called to the scene of two intoxicated siblings arguing.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers pursue a motorcyclist driving erratically. Deputies find broken drug paraphernalia in a car when conducting a traffic stop. A man who beat up his girlfriend hides from officers in an attic.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S15 : E28 Bad Fences make for Bad Neighbors
programme.desc: Officers are involved in a high-speed pursuit of suspected larcenists. Officers give a driver a sobriety test. Officers report to a call of a dispute in a neighborhood.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S24 : E17 Two Mr. Fix Its
programme.desc: A suspect attempts to flee when officers tell him they will search him. Two men get in a fight over window installation. A hotel room is filled like a clown car with multiple suspects.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A suspect bites an Officer while trying to avoid arrest. An Officer responds to a stabbing. An Officer is flagged down by a concerned group looking for a missing 4-year-old.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers respond after a bloody man is seen prowling around an apartment complex. Officers pull over a suspicious vehicle. Police seize drugs and a large knife from a bicyclist.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A man rams his wife’s car into his daughter’s car. Deputies find a rifle in a suspect’s car that was in a prior altercation. A man claims to run a travel business after deputies find evidence of id theft.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: An officer arrests a driver who attempts to swallow drugs stashed in his mouth. An officer arrests a repeated drug offender in an area notorious for drug trafficking. An officer pulls over an unlicensed woman driver who is arrested for providing falsified identification.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S26 : E12 Blood and Scars, Bro!
programme.desc: A suspect races through the neighborhood after his scooter can’t outrun police. Cops discover a drugged, incoherent wild man lying in the bushes. Officers try to make peace between neighbors with pit bull problems.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S24 : E22 Shots in the Big Easy
programme.desc: In New Orleans, police respond to a shots fired call. A suspect peddles a bike on the wrong side of the road with his girlfriend on the handlebars. A woman reports her husband to the police when he throws her down the stairs.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A man runs from Police over a parole violation. Officers respond when a trouble maker is expelled from a bar for bad behavior. Police pursue a man after he bails from his car during a traffic stop.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers intercept a drunk female driver using a PIT maneuver. A routine traffic stop results in an arrest after officers discover a concealed weapon as well as drugs. An officer makes an arrest after pulling over a vehicle transporting a sizable bag of marijuana.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: An inebriated man is arrested for peering through the window of a recovery center. After a foot chase, officers bring down a local felon. Police respond to a domestic dispute at a mobile home park.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S27 : E08 Step Away From the Cutlery
programme.desc: Cops attempt to piece together whether or not an erratic driver is in a stolen vehicle. A knife-wielding man complains that rude neighbors won’t stop smoking pot. Officers come upon an emotional man with a blade to his throat.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: An officer shows up as Coco the Clown in an undercover sting. The Vice unit conducts a reverse-prostitution sting designed to capture suspected “johns.”

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A foot chase gets complicated when the suspect proves he’s not in good health. A suspect believes he doesn’t need to follow the rules of the road. A man calls the police on his ex-girlfriend when she makes a moving mistake.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers give chase to a suspect on a bike. The passenger of a vehicle is arrested for possession. Police are given a classic "I'm holding it for a friend" excuse.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers pursue two juveniles involved in a carjacking. Two men sitting in a truck are spotted hiding something in the console. A man claims he took drug paraphernalia from kids as a good samaritan.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S13 : E16 Being Honest Goes Along Way
programme.desc: A man leads Officers on a pursuit across county lines. An Officer assists in an undercover sting to capture drug dealers. An Officer finds a gun in a suspects car.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers investigate an apparent stabbing. Officers respond to a call about a suspicious man loitering in a private park. A driver insists his vehicle is not stolen even though the plates are.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers are called when a disturbed naked man covered in blood is spotted in a park. Officers find a nude couple in a U-Haul truck. A traffic stop over a minor violation turns into a dangerous pursuit.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers attempt to detain undocumented people crosssing the border. Border patrol discovers a driver with a load of drugs in his car. Officers check passports and a suspicious-looking laptop.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S26 : E09 Guns, Hash, and Fire Hydrants
programme.desc: A chase becomes a flash flood when a fleeing driver runs into a fire hydrant. An insolent domestic violence suspect claims his girlfriend is a habitual 9-1-1 caller. Officers recover a cornucopia of contraband from a gun-toting couple.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers observe a man trying to pick up a hidden stash of narcotics. Occupants of suspicious vehicles have outstanding warrants. A domestic battery is investigated and justice is served.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S19 : E26 Copy of Leave her Alone
programme.desc: A shots fired investigation results in a foot pursuit and the recovery of a discarded firearm. An officer intervenes in a family dispute involving a daughter, boyfriend and $9,000 in warrants. Three women are questioned in connection to a suspicious vehicle.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A drunk driver rams into a pursuing police car. A man on a bike flees an area known for drug activity on a bike. A sniffling man attempts to hide a baggie with narcotics under his shirt.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S19 : E05 Tuck and Roll, Hold On!
programme.desc: A stolen vehicle investigation results in a brief foot chase and subsequent arrest. A driver is pulled over and is arrested for the possession of a controlled substance. While on patrol an officer spots an distressed man inside a vehicle with busted windows.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers recover a small bag of drugs from a crying suspect. A drunk woman hides a second ID in her back pocket. Police stop a vehicle that hit a patrol car.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: An officer wrestles a squirrely meth user who thinks he’s the Incredible Hulk. Cops catch a drug-carrying sprinter when he runs out of gas. A belligerent suspect doesn’t take kindly to having his socks removed.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A sting operation is set up to catch narcotics dealers. A man flees a restaurant without paying his four-hundred-dollar tab. A traffic stop for a tint violation leads to a felony arrest for narcotics.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers are called to a restaurant after the owner is held at gunpoint. Police respond to a woman being sexually harassed in a park. A drunk man tells police he is going to buy a lighthouse.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A man on parole dumps a stolen car and flees from officers on foot. A man denies stealing a wallet from a car with a smashed window. A hostile woman gives officers a false name.

programme.title: Maddie and Kiki's BBQ Barn
programme.desc: Fun-loving sisters and expert grillmasters Maddie and Kiki welcome you into their country barn for craveable eats and spicy jokes! On this episode, they smoke a whole chicken, whip up summery corn and watermelon sides, and share the wonder that is onion water lamb chops!

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.desc: Host Mary Tang shows us some easy Chinese take-out dishes that are a true "wok" in the park! First, she rolls up some juicy wontons to douse in a bowl of hot seasoned chicken broth and delicious bok choy for a Chinese classic - Wonton Soup. Next, she gets out her frying pan for a crispy bowl of flavourful Chicken Chow Mein with egg noodles, savoury browned chicken, crunchy snow peas, and tasty baby corn. For an even simpler dish (and fan favourite), she then cooks up a hearty dish of Beef and Broccoli. Finally, Mary plays on different flavours with her Sweet and Sour Pork. Marinated pork cubes fried in a wonderful wok with fragrant garlic and ginger, sweet and tart red and green peppers,...

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.sub-title: S03 : E12 Vietnam's Love for Noodles
programme.desc: Noodles are a staple in Vietnamese cooking and host Lisa Nguyen showcases their versatility by starting off with fine vermicelli Stuffed Squid. Beautifully grilled and charred, these squid make great finger food. Lisa sticks to stuffing with her next dish - a Vietnamese favourite, Spring Rolls. Crunchy on the outside and filled with soft glass noodles, juicy ground pork, tender shrimp, and delectable crab meat on the inside, you're sure to be salivating at the sight of these tasty creations. Next on the menu, a Crispy Egg Noodle Pillow with a medley of vegetables and sauces on top. Lisa then finishes with a fun seafood and tomato soup; make sure you try the yummy shrimp and delightful...

programme.title: Bring On The Karbs
programme.desc: Chefs Erica and Josh Karbelnik go head-to-head to see who can come up with the most tantalizing date night dish! Josh makes lamb rack Vindaloo while Erica prepares cowboy steak and handmade linguini!

programme.title: Bring On The Karbs
programme.desc: Chefs Erica and Josh Karbelnik go head-to-head to see who can come up with the most tantalizing fancy fast food! Josh makes chicken fried lobster while Erica prepares a Kobe crunch wrap and fish & chips!

programme.title: Bring On The Karbs
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 Everything’s Better with Butter
programme.desc: Chefs Erica and Josh Karbelnik go head-to-head to see who can come up with the most tantalizing dishes featuring butter! Josh makes fish and a butter washed cocktail while Erica prepares Parisian gnocchi!

programme.title: Bring On The Karbs
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 One Ingredient Three Ways
programme.desc: Chefs Erica and Josh Karbelnik go head-to-head to see who can come up with the most tantalizing dish featuring one ingredient three ways! Josh works with parsnips while Erica preps potatoes!

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.desc: Bring on the seafood! Home cook Mary Tang kicks off this episode of One World Kitchen 3 with a unique dish featuring chewy clams, sweet and bitter fermented black beans, and a collection of spices. Next, she makes us her favourite shrimp dish - Shrimp and Egg Fried Rice. Fluffy egg bits, lightly flavoured nutty brown rice, and a pop of tender shrimp works wonders for the taste buds. A common appetizer, Mary then walks us through a spicy concoction of deep-fried salt and pepper squid or Calamari. And who doesn't love lobster? Mary finishes off with Cantonese Lobster with Ginger and Scallions (yes, it tastes as good as it sounds!). A Cantonese take on the juicy protein, this dish is fried...

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.sub-title: S03 : E13 Balancing Sweet with Savoury
programme.desc: A tasty four-course Vietnamese meal using fruit? Yes, please! For her first dish, talented home cook Lisa Nguyen uses tangy tamarind pulp to balance flavours in a savoury bowl of Vietnamese Sour Fish Soup. Then, she combines tart pomelo and sweet pineapple with juicy crab meat for a flavourful salad. Next up, hot Chicken Coconut Curry with a hint of citrusy lemongrass, sweet potatoes, and a kaffir lime leaf. Pair it with a warm, toasty baguette and you're good to go! Lisa's last dish is a mouth-watering, classic Vietnamese dessert. Soft and chewy Steamed Banana Cake drizzled in a sweet velvety coconut sauce crunchy sesame seeds will have you begging for more!

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.desc: Talented home cook Jasmin Ibrahim prepares delicious, sharable small plates in this episode of One World Kitchen. First on the menu, Grilled Lamb Skewers. Wonderfully charred and seasoned with sweet cinnamon, potent all-spice, and a punch of garlic, these lamb skewers will be the hype at your next family get-together! Then, Jasmin makes a famous Lebanese classic - Falafel and Hummus (so tasty!). Next up, savoury Zucchini Fritters with a zesty yogurt sauce are added to the mix for a little dinner party pizzazz. Finally, Jasmin's favourite cheese is the star of this next dish - Grilled Halloumi. Served with a sweet and citrusy rose drink, this small plate will have your guests going crazy!

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.sub-title: S03 : E27 Cheese with Every Meal!
programme.desc: Cheese - a staple in traditional Greek cuisine! Talented home cook Joanna Chery fries up two delicious ap- petizers called Saganaki, both featuring two different types of cheese. First, she fries up kefaltyri, a hard, salty cheese in a dramatic burning flame of ouzo (licorice-flavoured alcohol) - Opa! Then, Joanna shows us a popular Fried Shrimp and Cheese appetizer using tasty feta and tender shrimp. Pair both dishes with a Greek rustic bread and you've nailed it! Next up, Joanna prepares a Greek classic - Spanakopita. This mouth-watering dish is made up of creamy ricotta, crispy phyllo pastry, fresh spinach, and a hint of dill (yum!). Moving on, Joanna showcases her all-time favourite...

programme.title: Global Veggies
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 Scotland, France, USA, Myanmar
programme.desc: Chef Pino Di Cerbo creates veggie dishes inspired by Scotland, France, the USA, and Myanmar!

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.desc: Ever crave a delicious Indian feast? Host Vijaya Selvaraju cooks up Indian classics for a delightful family meal.

programme.title: The Wizard of Whatever
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Papaya Salad, Carrot Hog Dogs, Squid, and Tofu
programme.desc: Chef Kyle Crawford unveils four spellbinding dishes! First up, green papaya salad with crispy pork! Next, BBQ carrot hot dogs! Followed by grilled squid steak! Finishing with Korean BBQ tofu!

programme.title: VegHeadz
programme.desc: Say hello to yellow with chef Pino Di Cerbo as he brightens each dish with glowing, golden-hued produce! Corn on the cob gets a fun presentation as 'ribs', chopped into spears, spiked with harissa spices, and grilled until smoky. Next is a sweet and sour detour with mangoes and lemons in a no-bake cheesecake with a unique popped amaranth crust. Next, aromatic and hearty Kerala-style curry includes all things gold and beautiful: creamy yellow potatoes, sweet yellow peppers, even snappy yellow beans! Finally, stick around for a Thai-inspired noodle salad, where even the noodles are veggies! Strands of mildly sweet spaghetti squash paired with nutty cashews, tender sprouts and a punchy...

programme.title: Pressure's On
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Hearty Weeknight Multi-Cooker Dishes
programme.desc: Do you know the secret to an uncracked cheesecake? Host Vanessa Gianfrancesco shares her trick to making a perfectly silky-smooth Salted Caramel Cheesecake.

programme.title: Up the Dish
programme.desc: Host Poppy Sandler kicks off Up the Dish with her version of mom's spaghetti - a scrumptious Spaghetti Pomodoro that takes it to the top! Next up to the plate is Missy Hui, who hits it out of the park with her heavenly Bun Viet, a sweet and sour vermicelli noodle bowl and citrusy lemongrass grilled pork combo. Then, Tiera Singh takes up the challenge with her vegetarian Miso Ramen - an umami flavour bomb of miso, mirin, and even more noodle goodness. But there's nowhere to go but up with Micah's Lobster Cantonese Chow Mein, an elegantly upscaled rendition of Chinese noodles with bright ginger, tender gai lan, and crisp chow mein, all coated in an exquisite black bean sauce.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: The most liked post on any grill-master's social feed is 'meat on a stick' - and Chef Spencer's Turkish-style chicken kabob is worth every click! He marinates thick juicy chicken morsels in yogurt and spices, and then grills these flavourful skewers to a charry perfection. Next up is the creative 'Tornado Potato' which re- invents grilled potatoes with a wild presentation and a trio of toppings. Spencer then assembles Char Siu Sliders on tiny party- ready buns. Stuffed with a soy, honey and umami-packed hoisin lacquered slow-and-low grilled pork belly, these tasty little sliders will have your taste buds tingling. For his final recipe, Spencer whips up toasted crispy roti cups; topping...

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: Chef Spencer starts this spicy barbeque episode with flavours from Thailand with a Bok Choy with a Ginger Chili Sauce. Powerful bird's eye chilies are packed into a sweet and spicy sauce and served over tasty grilled bok choy. Spencer then introduces us to Calabrian chilies, mashed into a spice paste and rubbed on butterflied chicken that then gets grilled to flame-kissed perfection. Next, Spencer gives fresh calamari some heat with Korean chilies that add their distinctive heat and flavour before grilling this scrumptious recipe and serving it over a comforting bed of rice and peas. Finally, Spencer prepares Seekh Kabobs, made with ground lamb spiked with punchy dried Kashmiri chilies...

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.desc: China celebrates harvest with the Moon Festival, when the moon is at its fullest during mid-autumn. The best part? A delicious feast! Cantonese expert Mary Tang prepares a common Moon Festival dish - earthy and tasty Mushroom Stir Fry. Then, she cooks up a mouth-watering, Cantonese must-have - Steamed Crab. Using flawless technique, Mary breaks the juicy crab into pieces, fries and steams it in scented spices and sauces. Another Moon Festival staple is Cantonese Roast Duck - Mary uses sweet-savoury Chinese five-spice powder, dark soy sauce, and aromatic white pepper to make a fragrant rub. Finally, Moon Cake at the Moon Festival a given. Exquisitely crafted with red bean paste and sweet...

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.sub-title: S03 : E14 A Banquet fit for an Emperor
programme.desc: Elegant Vietnamese fare is often inspired by legendary imperial city cuisine. In this One World Kitchen 3 episode, Host Lisa Nguyen gives us a magical taste of royalty with four colourful and delectable dishes. To start, Lisa ex- quisitely assembles a nice little starter for a royal dinner party - delicious Rice Cakes with Dried Shrimp. Next, she kicks it up a notch with a Spicy Hue Beef Noodle Soup - a truly slurp-worthy dish! For a touch of sweetness, Lisa then steams caramelized pork and tender shrimp dumplings in a lovely banana leaf. And there's no such thing as a classy Vietnamese dinner party without Baby Clams with Rice! The blend of contrasting flavours and textures in this...
